fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Youth, Single market, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Global Health Access Solutions will follow policies and initiatives related to: access to medicines, blockchain,  digital health, European Health Technology Assesment,  pricing and reimbursement, and health insurance.
relevant_communication:
Global Health Access Solutions helps clients to meet the stakeholders that matter for their specific cause. We also create dialogues between different stakeholders 
 
http://globalhealthaccess.net/nproject/policy-induction-week-for-cancer-patient-advocacy-group/
goals__remit: At Global Health Access Solutions, we offer clients improved patient access for their health solutions by translating healthcare policy into impactful & tangible strategies. Our competencies include improving shareholder value and advancing the uptake of your health solutions. Creating sustainable & receptive funding environments for your organization is one of our core-strengths.
